title: Can't access django admin
body:
How to reproduce the behaviour
---------
<!-- Before submitting an issue, make sure to check the docs and closed issues and FAQ to see if any of the solutions work for you. https://github.com/doccano/doccano/wiki/Frequently-Asked-Questions -->
Try to navigate to 'myip:3000/admin/'
Nothing is displayed, and in the js console, there's an error:
```
Error: Avoided redundant navigation to current location: "/admin/".
    at createRouterError (vue-router.esm.js?8c4f:2062)
    at createNavigationDuplicatedError (vue-router.esm.js?8c4f:2035)
    at HTML5History.confirmTransition (vue-router.esm.js?8c4f:2195)
    at HTML5History.transitionTo (vue-router.esm.js?8c4f:2125)
    at HTML5History.push (vue-router.esm.js?8c4f:2492)
    at VueRouter.push (vue-router.esm.js?8c4f:2916)
    at VueRouter.push (router.js?5783:35)
    at eval (client.js?06a0:800)
    at Vue._next (client.js?06a0:294)
    at Object.app.context.redirect (utils.js?ebed:183)
```

<!-- Include a code example or the steps that led to the problem. Please try to be as specific as possible. -->

Your Environment
---------
<!-- Include details of your environment.-->
*   Operating System: ubuntu on aws
*   Python Version Used: 3.8.10
*   When you install doccano: cc364068485264cacbc5516cc7e4b4b5b6b7b98a
*   How did you install doccano (Heroku button etc): git clone
